alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Manatee, northwestern Charlotte, southwestern DeSoto and Sarasota Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Port Charlotte to near North Port. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Port, Port Charlotte, Myakka River State Park, Murdock, Gator Creek Estate, Gulf Cove, South Venice, El Jobean, Grove City, Warm Mineral Springs, Lake Suzy, Hidden River, Nokomis, Venice Gardens, Fort Ogden, Charlotte Harbor, Rotonda, Laurel and Harbour Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
